Building Your Online Academic Identity

Today I gave a workshop as a part of University of Michiganâ€™s Institute for the Humanities Publishing Practice Series aimed at faculty and graduate students looking to build-up their online identity. Thereâ€™s already been great work done by the writers at ProfHacker on this topic, insightful tips over at EDUCAUSE, and an article published in First Monday studying and classifying the types of online academic personas folks are starting to create for themselves. This workshop tried to bring all of that together and emphasize that building your online persona is really just SEO for your name.
